price: 36. Ne poursuis pas ce dont tu ne détiens pas la science. L’ouïe, la vue et le cœur, de tout cela il sera demandé des comptes.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡفُ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٌۚ إِنَّ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡبَصَرَ وَٱلۡفُؤَادَ كُلُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ كَانَ عَنۡهُ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā taqfu mā laysa laka bihi ʿil'mun inna al-samʿa wal-baṣara wal-fuāda kullu ulāika kāna ʿanhu masūlan
